name: r1_wilderHouse
longMessage:
This quirky place is where you live.
You have an Oompa Loompa as a butler, of course.
There is a key holder hanging on the wall.
Through a window you see your Tesla parked outside to the east.
shortMessage:
The Oompa Loompa greets you at the door.
'Back so soon?'
You left the Tesla parked outside to the east.
